description: Prompts to support leaders in biotech, pharma, and medtech across research, clinical, regulatory, and commercialization workstreams.

prompts.title: Clinical Study Design
prompts.prompt: As a Clinical Program Director, outline the study design for {{indication}} phase {{trial_phase}} trial. Include endpoints, population criteria, randomization scheme, and risk mitigation strategies.

prompts.title: Regulatory Strategy
prompts.prompt: As a Regulatory Affairs Lead, craft a global regulatory strategy for {{product_or_therapy}}. Map required submissions, key agency interactions, timelines, and potential accelerated pathways.

prompts.title: CMC Readiness Plan
prompts.prompt: As a CMC Lead, develop a chemistry, manufacturing, and controls readiness plan for {{program}}. Detail process validation, analytical methods, supply chain considerations, and documentation needs.

prompts.title: Medical Affairs Brief
prompts.prompt: As a Medical Affairs Director, create a scientific communication plan for {{therapy}} ahead of {{conference_or_launch}}. Cover key messages, evidence gaps, KOL engagement, and publication roadmap.

prompts.title: Quality Management System
prompts.prompt: As a Quality Leader, assess the QMS for {{site_or_program}} against ISO/GxP standards. Identify compliance gaps, CAPA actions, and digital tools to strengthen oversight.

prompts.title: Real-World Evidence Plan
prompts.prompt: As an Evidence Generation Lead, propose a real-world evidence strategy to support {{indication}}. Include data sources, study designs, endpoints, and regulatory acceptance considerations.

prompts.title: Market Access Dossier
prompts.prompt: As a Market Access Director, summarize the payer value story for {{therapy}} in {{region}}. Provide health economic models, budget impact assumptions, and policy watchpoints.

prompts.title: Portfolio Prioritization
prompts.prompt: As a Life Sciences Strategy Lead, prioritize the R&D portfolio across {{therapeutic_area}} programs. Evaluate scientific risk, commercial opportunity, capital requirements, and partner options.

prompts.title: Lab Operations Optimization
prompts.prompt: As an R&D Operations Manager, optimize lab operations for {{facility}}. Recommend process improvements, digital lab tools, compliance safeguards, and KPIs for productivity.

prompts.title: Post-Market Surveillance
prompts.prompt: As a Pharmacovigilance Lead, design a post-market safety surveillance plan for {{product}}. Define signal detection processes, reporting cadence, and cross-functional coordination.
